mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_INFO ( USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, SALT ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userEmail}, #{password}, #{salt} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE USER_NAME = #{userEmail}
SELECT salt FROM ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{ userEmail }

WHERE FIND_TOKEN = #{token}
